attributes.action: Create an inflation index that represents the reality of what we really pay.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is well understood that statistics released by the government bear no relationship to what we pay on a day to day basis. Many significant items are excluded, particularly important to pensioners & other groups on low incomes. The Office of statistic have publically stated that government data released does not reflect the real facts & their criticisms have not been addressed.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
